name: Cloaking Device
communitySentiment: Rat behavior enabler - for those allergic to fair fights
counterPlay: Listen for footsteps, use Sonar Grenade or Motion Sensor
proTip: Footsteps still audible - good players will track you by sound

name: Evasive Dash
communitySentiment: ADHD incarnate - the annoying rabbit that won't stay still
counterPlay: Predict dash patterns, use area denial weapons
proTip: Three dashes = three chances to make enemies rage quit

name: Grappling Hook
communitySentiment: Spider-Man simulator - high-flying fun but predictable
proTip: You can fire while swinging - practice mid-air shots

name: Dematerializer
communitySentiment: Ghost wall hacker - create surprise angles like a magician
counterPlay: Watch for shimmer effect, pre-fire common spots
proTip: Rematerialize walls behind you to cut off pursuers

name: Guardian Turret
communitySentiment: Set it and forget it - automated salt dispenser
counterPlay: Glitch Grenade, explosives, or shoot from range
proTip: Place at off-angles or high ground for surprise cover fire

name: Healing Beam
communitySentiment: Team mom simulator - keeps everyone alive while they ignore you
counterPlay: Focus the healer first, use burst damage
proTip: Beam has limited range - position between teammates and cover

name: Recon Senses
communitySentiment: Wish.com wallhacks - the forgotten spec nobody uses
proTip: Lowest pick rate of Medium specs for good reason

name: Charge N Slam
communitySentiment: The bulldozer - wallhack express for bonk enthusiasts
counterPlay: Dodge the charge, punish the recovery
proTip: You can steer slightly while airborne - aim for groups

name: Goo Gun
communitySentiment: The cement mixer - turtle simulator for creative builders
counterPlay: Fire damage, explosives, or just go around
proTip: 4-5 second bunkers, blocks dashes and grapples now

name: Mesh Shield
communitySentiment: Rectangle warriors unite - portable fortress for objective campers
counterPlay: Flank inside shield, use Glitch Grenade
proTip: Still OP with coordinated teams despite heavy nerfs

name: Winch Claw
communitySentiment: Get over here! - Scorpion hook for cashout yoinks
counterPlay: Break line of sight, use obstacles
proTip: Great for cashout manipulation and environmental kills

name: H+ Infuser
communitySentiment: Friendly fire healing gun - Light medic nobody asked for but everyone loves
proTip: Requires precision aim - 12s cooldown when depleted

name: Breach Charge
communitySentiment: Budget RPG - floor deletion tool for cashout drops
proTip: Remote detonation allows creative objective drops

name: Flashbang
communitySentiment: Retina burner - because fair fights are overrated
proTip: Bounces off walls - bank shots around corners

name: Frag Grenade
communitySentiment: The classic boom ball - simple, effective, timeless
proTip: Cook it for 2 seconds before throwing for airburst

name: Goo Grenade
communitySentiment: Green goop generator - still annoying despite nerfs
proTip: Use for instant cover or blocking doorways

name: Glitch Grenade
communitySentiment: The anti-gadget menace - essential for high-level play
proTip: Mandatory in competitive to counter Heavy gadgets

name: Motion Sensor
communitySentiment: Wallhacks for beginners - intel gathering made easy
proTip: Place in high traffic areas, lasts 30 seconds

name: Smoke Grenade
communitySentiment: Vape cloud deployer - tactical or just annoying
proTip: Blocks all vision including thermal - use for revives

name: Sonar Grenade
communitySentiment: Wallhack in a can - temporary x-ray vision
proTip: Shows enemies through walls for 10 seconds

name: Thermal Vision
communitySentiment: Predator goggles - see hot bodies through smoke
proTip: Toggle on/off quickly to avoid tunnel vision

name: Tracking Dart
communitySentiment: GPS tracker - only useful if your team has comms
proTip: Tags enemy for 20s, visible to whole team

name: Vanishing Bomb
communitySentiment: Pink splash of chaos - team invisibility for cowards
proTip: 5-second team invisibility with 20s cooldown

name: Breach Drill
communitySentiment: It's payday fellas! - finally Medium gets something cool
proTip: Drills through walls, blinds enemies, then explodes

name: APS Turret
communitySentiment: Anti-fun device - explosive spam counter
proTip: Rising usage due to projectile-heavy meta

name: Data Reshaper
communitySentiment: Reality roulette - turns enemy gadgets into furniture
proTip: Can turn enemy turrets into barrels - pure chaos

name: Defibrillator
communitySentiment: Instant clutch button - why M/M/M teams are unkillable
proTip: Most powerful gadget in game - instant mid-fight revives

name: Explosive Mine
communitySentiment: Surprise pancake - the camping tool
proTip: Hide in bushes or around corners, 125 damage

name: Gas Grenade
communitySentiment: Toxic cloud dispenser - area denial for days
proTip: Combines with fire for extra damage over time

name: Gas Mine
communitySentiment: Fart trap - when you want an area to smell like death
proTip: Gas + Fire = Big damage, use for area denial

name: Glitch Trap
communitySentiment: Lag switch landmine - gives enemies fake ping spikes
proTip: Place on stairs or doorways for maximum confusion

name: Goo Grenade
communitySentiment: Finally less goo spam! - still most annoying gadget
proTip: Health nerf makes it less oppressive but still meta

name: Jump Pad
communitySentiment: Mobility for the whole family - vertical supremacy
proTip: Essential for both offensive flanks and defensive repos

name: Pyro Grenade
communitySentiment: Fire starter - turns areas into no-go zones
proTip: Burns through goo, combos with gas for big damage

name: Zipline
communitySentiment: DIY transportation - for when stairs are too mainstream
proTip: Create unexpected angles, but you're vulnerable while riding

name: Healing Emitter
communitySentiment: Area healing station - pocket Heavy support perfection
proTip: Makes Heavy essential for objective control with AOE healing

name: Anti-Gravity Cube
communitySentiment: The floaty boi - zero-G zone for memes
proTip: Situational for objective disruption, fun factor 10/10

name: Barricade
communitySentiment: The wall - instant cover for tactical turtles
proTip: Angle it to cover multiple threats, 1000 HP

name: C4
communitySentiment: The surprise boom box - one-shot potential
proTip: Stick to cashouts or ceilings for devastating drops

name: Dome Shield
communitySentiment: The snow globe - turtle shell objective thief
proTip: Blocks all projectiles for 12s, enemies can enter

name: Explosive Mine
communitySentiment: The landmine - Light class deletion device
proTip: Place on objectives or choke points, 125 damage

name: Frag Grenade
communitySentiment: Old reliable - when in doubt, throw it out
proTip: Cook for 2 seconds for airburst damage

name: Gas Grenade
communitySentiment: Toxic zone creator - area denial specialist
proTip: Ignite with fire for massive damage combo

name: Goo Grenade
communitySentiment: Green hell sticky situation - goo spam enabler
proTip: Stack with Goo Gun for maximum area control

name: Pyro Grenade
communitySentiment: Fire and forget - literally sets the world ablaze
proTip: Melts goo instantly, area denial king

name: Pyro Mine
communitySentiment: Napalm surprise - sets unfortunate steppers on fire
proTip: Hide near gas for explosive combos

name: RPG-7
communitySentiment: The equalizer - noob tube building eraser
proTip: 175 damage direct hit, destroys all cover
